metadata.title: CVE-2021-47268 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: usb:typec: tcpm: cancel vdm and state machine hrtimer when unregister tcpm portA pending hrtimer may expire after the kthread_worker of tcpm port isdestroyed, see below kernel dump when do module unload, fix it by cancelthe 2 hrtimers.
